entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
